headline: 2 Affordable Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy And Hold Forever
summary: Tariff-related uncertainty makes now a great time to shop for deals in the stock market.  Alpine Income and Dollar General are two relatively affordable picks to buy and hold for the long haul.  Long-term investing is the key to sustainable returns in the stock market because it smooths out near-term volatility to let a company's fundamental value shine through.
